1.name: Call Lightning
1.description: Bridging the heavens and Earth, Thor redirects a mighty bolt of lightning towards his opponent.

2.name: Mjölnir's Fury
2.description: Nobody can outrun the mystical hammer Mjölnir.

3.name: Odin's Wrath
3.description: Thor channels the powers of a God and strikes with Mjölnir using the strength of a thunderstorm.

signature.name: Ragnarok
signature.description: Stunning the Thunder God infuriates him, while opponents stunned by the Thunder God become vulnerable targets for \"That Which Smashes\".

description: The mighty Thor is Asgard's finest and bravest warrior. With god-like strength, command over lightning, and the aid of the legendary hammer Mjölnir, Thor defends Earth alongside his battle-worthy companions, the Avengers. However, Thor must often contend with the evil schemes of his own brother, the nefarious Loki.
